content: Our people — Engineering | University of Idahoskip to main contentskip to footer Our people at EngineeringMenuEngineeringAcademicsStudent successOur PeopleNews and eventsEngineering OutreachResearchPartnershipsYou will receive mentorship and support from more than 100 nationally and internationally recognized UIdaho College of Engineering employees who are committed to your academic success.Our distinguished team includes experts across diverse engineering disciplines, offering guidance in areas such as mechanical design, fluid dynamics, cybersecurity and sustainable energy systems.
